thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel's Feud with Matt Damon Was the Highlight of the 2017 Oscars
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel's Feud with Matt Damon Was the Highlight of the 2017 Oscars

author: Matt Miller
title: Jimmy Kimmel's Feud with Matt Damon Was the Highlight of the 2017 Oscars
text:
The Oscars Were the Highlight of Jimmy Kimmel and Matt Damon's Feud 
Watch their best moment from the Academy Awards. Getty By Matt Miller Feb 27, 2017 Perhaps you've heard: Jimmy Kimmel and Matt Damon have a feud. You've seen it on Kimmel's show. And you've seen it at the Emmys. It was only inevitable that the feud would make its way to the Oscars—Kimmel's biggest hosting duty yet. First, he took a couple of easy shots in his opening monologue. But, leading into Damon's introduction of Best Original Screenplay, he played a pre-recorded video of himself talking about We Bought a Zoo . Throughout the night, actors have been talking about their favorite movies, and Kimmel took the opportunity to bash one of Damon's career lowlights. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Jimmy Kimmel rips Matt Damon with fake 'We Bought a Zoo' tribute: "He has almost no discernible talent." #Oscars pic.twitter.com/HpX8zh8l73 
— Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 27, 2017 Afterward, as Damon and Ben Affleck introduced the category, Kimmel hijacked the orchestra to play his rival off. It's hard to imagine the feud going bigger than this. The Super Bowl? The Olympics? Their own reality show? More from Esquire:
